Detailed Description

Implements a chain of one or more track filters that all must pass.

static bool ldmx::TrackFilterChain::process ( const G4Track *  aTrack,
const std::vector< TrackFilterChain * > &  filters 
) [inline, static]

Process a track using multiple filter chains. Only one chain needs to pass for this to return true.

Parameters:
aTrackThe Geant4 track to process.
Returns:
True if at least one chain passes.

                                                                                                    {
                bool save = false;
                for (auto filterChain : filters) {
                    save = filterChain->process(aTrack);
                    if (save) {
                        break;
                    }
                }
                return save;
            }
bool ldmx::TrackFilterChain::process ( const G4Track *  aTrack) [inline]

Process the track using all filters in the chain. All filters must pass for the chain to return true.

Parameters:
aTrackThe Geant4 track to process.
Returns:
True if all filters pass.
